replies.body:
{{champion:16}} You know what you need? 

{{champion:6}} Crabs?

{{champion:16}}  What? No! You need friends...or at least a friend. 

{{champion:6}} Hey I got friends. 

{{champion:16}} Weapons don't count. 

{{champion:6}} Oh...well I guess I am as friendless as you are. 

{{champion:16}} Hey I have friends. 

{{champion:6}} Banana don't count. 

{{champion:16}} What do you- Oh I see what you did there. Ok let me think. We need a sign, maybe a big one so people can see. Talking about your likes and dislikes and looking for companionship. 

{{champion:6}} Wait this is soundling like one of those dating things. 

{{champion:16}} That's it! That is what you need. Quick, we need to find Blitzcrank and have you take his test. _runs off_


{{champion:6}} Oh this is not going to end well....
3rd line should be {{champion:16}} sir. Thanks for the post anyways.

Third line should probably be Soraka, not Urgot.

Unless Urgot started talking to himself (which I wouldn't really be opposed to).
{{champion:254}} when you hit a wall... maybe its time to stop drinking
Battlecast is not only Xerath's coolest skin, but also super cheap! I'm so getting it.
